      • onTouchMove

        protected abstract boolean onTouchMove(android.view.View v,
                                       android.view.MotionEvent event)
        First of all by moving first threshold scaledTouchSlop go into moving state, callback

        You can add in your code second threshold, to reduce the unnecessary cost

         ...
 if (Math.abs(lastX - nowX) >= 1 || Math.abs(lastY - nowY) >= 1) {
   //Do something
 }
 ...
